overview: Come one, come all! Ante up and take your best shot. Dawn, Toni, Jennifer, Bunny, Terri. You call it these horny vixens will do it. They’re game for whatever your game is. A flip of the coin and you win – you’re in! Heads or Tails…you cannot fail. They’re loose, but tight…they do it right. Anytime…day or night. Take a chance with the gold piece girls. There are no losers. It’s all in how you play the game.
title: Head and Tails
